name: ​Crash & Dash
description:
GAME OVERVIEW:

  • In this game, the player is a cop, who is on a mission to catch the bank robbers. The only way to do that is by chasing them down and crashing into them.
KEEP IN MIND:
  • The player’s main objective is to dash into enemy cars before the time runs out. Once they manage to catch all the cars, they will start the next level.
Controls

D-Pad makes the player move in the respective directions, A button accelerates the car, and B button activates “Dash” which will crash the enemy’s car, which is in front of the player.

DEVELOPMENT TEAM:

Game Design/Programming/Art: Diego Leonardo Gonzalez Lopez

Level Design/ Art/Game Design: Aakash Kumar Bhagchandani

Project Management,/Game Design/SFX/Art Concept: Shubham Sunilkumar Bora

*Game Design Document in the downloadable contents*
